advantages.name: Caern Access
advantages.desc: You have access to another sept's caern.

advantages.name: Awakened Caern
advantages.desc: Your sept is warding an awakened caern or one on the verge of awakening. +1 to your caern value, does not stack! (Players can pool dots)

flaws.name: Caern Pariah
flaws.desc: You are barred from accessing any caerns near your home. (Doesn't apply to a caern your sept owns).

advantages.name: Day Job
advantages.desc: You have a day job. + 1 to subterfuge or persuasion when concealing your Garou nature.

advantages.name: Corroborated Day Job
advantages.desc: Similar to day job, but your co-workers reaffirm your employment. +2 to subterfuge or persuasion when concealing your Garou nature.

advantages.name: Language fluency
advantages.desc: You speak, read and write another language fluently.

flaws.name: Illiterate
flaws.desc: You cannot read or write. Academics and Science are capped at 1.

advantages.name: Clement Lupus
advantages.desc: Your lupus form appears more like a domesticated dog, no mortals would view you as a wolf.

advantages.name: Stunning
advantages.desc: You are considered exceptionally good-looking, you turn heads everywhere you go.

advantages.name: Obscure Safe House
advantages.desc: Efforts to seek out anyone within your safe house suffer a 2 die penalty.

advantages.name: Secure Safe House
advantages.desc: Add 2 die to any relevant pools when trying to prevent entry into your safe house.

flaws.name: Hopeless Addiction
flaws.desc: Lose 2 die from all pools if you do not indulge in your substance of choice during the last scene.

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.desc: Lose 1 die from all pools if you do not indulge in your substance of choice during the last scene.

advantages.name: Moon-Quickened
advantages.desc: Howl at the moon once per night to restore a point of superficial willpower.

advantages.name: Moon-Riled
advantages.desc: Howl at the moon once per night to gain a dot of rage.

flaws.name: Folkloric Bane
flaws.desc: You take aggravated damage from a folkloric weapon such as holy water, wolfsbane or the weapon of a true believer. Decide with your ST.

flaws.name: Folkloric Block
flaws.desc: A folkloric block such as wolfsbane, a cross or the presence of a virgin can prevent your entry. Must spend 1 WP to push past it.

flaws.name: Folkloric Tell
flaws.desc: You bear some sort of physical indication of being Garou that unsettles mortals.

flaws.name: Crone's Curse
flaws.desc: Either some curse causes rapid aging or you experienced the first change late in life. -1 HP.

flaws.name: Moon-Thrall
flaws.desc: Upon seeing the moon for the first time each night, you immediately change form to glabro or hispo. (Must still perform rage checks!)
